welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sugar Land, where southern charm meets modern amenities. Known for its cultural diversity, rich history, and beautiful parks, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen
restaurants.description: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a fried chicken joint located in Sugar Land.
restaurants.address: 16540 Southwest Fwy (at First Colony Blvd), Sugar Land, TX 77479

restaurants.name: Raising Cane's Chicken Fingers
restaurants.description: Raising Cane's Chicken Fingers is a fried chicken joint located in Sugar Land.
restaurants.address: 1529 Highway 6 (Fluor Daniel Drive), Sugar Land, TX 77478

restaurants.name: Jupiter Pizza & Waffles Co.
restaurants.description: Jupiter Pizza & Waffles Co. is a pizzeria located in Sugar Land.

restaurants.name: P.F. Chang's China Bistro
restaurants.description: P.F. Chang's China Bistro is a chinese restaurant located in Sugar Land.
restaurants.address: 2120 Lone Star Dr (at Town Ctr), Sugar Land, TX 77479

restaurants.name: Brookstreet Bar-B-Q
restaurants.description: Brookstreet Bar-B-Q is a bbq joint located in Sugar Land.
restaurants.address: 1418 Highway 6 (at Brooks St.), Sugar Land, TX 77478

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Houston Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at West Houston Airport caters to high-end clients and offers luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sugar Land Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sugar Land Regional Airport caters to executive and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights and includes a lounge, concierge services, and aircraft parking.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at William P Hobby Airport, serving domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at William P Hobby Airport, primarily used by Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ellington Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ellington Field Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
